Q5: <https://corpora.linguistik.uzh.ch/annis/?id=a0fa2756-1342-4c69-a53d-21adca7819b9>

query:
```{aql}
tok=‎/.*‎/ & 
tok=‎/.*‎/ & tok=‎/(okay|oki|oke|okey|okee|okidoki|o\.k\.|okk|okkk)‎‎/ & tok=‎/.*‎/ &
msg_id = ‎/.*‎/ &
msg_id = ‎/.*‎/ &
spk = ‎/.*‎/ &
spk = ‎/.*‎/ 
& #1 . #2 & #2 _=_ #5
& #2 . #3
& #3 . #4 & #3 _=_ #6
& #5 != #6 
& #2 _=_ #7 
& #4 _=_ #8
```

```{aql}

```
